ing: 1/4 cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip â„¢
des: "This is a really simple side dish featuring peas and cheese.  I double the recipe and take it to many family gatherings."
ins: In a medium serving bowl, mix together the peas, Cheddar cheese and onion. Stir in the sugar and creamy salad dressing. Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.
